attributes.action: Not to allow airlines to charge passengers to use toilets on their planes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think this is a pathetic idea. People such as the over 60s, those who take medication where the side effects increase the number of trips to toilets and children will be penalised.

Plus on flights that go outside Europe, everyone needs the toilet. Who doesn't use the toilets on a plane when flying to Australia?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
